snippet: The performance space Littlefield hosts a crafts fair and performances by young musicians, while the Invisible Dog Art Center presents readings by Jennifer Egan and Luc Sante.
lead_paragraph: The performance space Littlefield hosts a crafts fair and performances by young musicians, while the Invisible Dog Art Center presents readings by Jennifer Egan and Luc Sante.

headline.seo: Free Events at Littlefield, and a PEN Reading in Carroll Gardens
